## TNode.\_\_setParent() method

Change parent of current node and handle side effects, including:

- remove current node from parent's children (if parent exists)

- recompute path segments &amp; depth

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected __setParent(parent?: TNode): TNode<Data>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parent | [TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> a [TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md) to attach to |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md)<!-- -->&lt;Data&gt;

this [TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md)
